posts.post_content:
Looking to make another dent on completing my run for all the backs.  Nearly there after a lot of help from some good people. I would appreciate a bit more help with this one.  Not necessarily looking for any HOF or name.  Just looking for a respectable back.  Grades 1 or 2 are ok so long as they represent the back well.

Reply, PM or email me.  [url]bliztu@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks!
Jared

Bump... got one response from PM... but thought I'd let this ride the first page once more.  

Thanks!
Hi Jared are you still looking for one??

[quote name="ruth-gehrig" post=957619]Hi Jared are you still looking for one??[/QUOTE]

Absolutely... you got PM.

BTW, sorry Lee, still in the market.  This back is becoming my unicorn.
Bump... still looking.  The ones offered have been factory 25's.
